channel.title: football physics on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in football physics on Game6r

item.title: Soccer Mover
item.description: In this game, you will have the opportunity to touch history and repeat the most unforgettable moments in the life of a famous football player! Third person view. The camera is located slightly above and to the side. You see the penalty area, the goal and the players. Throw free kicks to score another historic goal. By the way, easier said than done.

item.title: Soccer Physics 2
item.description: Do you want to laugh heartily and look at completely stoned football players? This can be done while playing Football Physics for two. By the way, it also has a single player mode. Side view. The character drawing is very cool. There are not athletes on the field, but more and more some hippies, rastamans and other rabble. Matches are played in a two-on-two format. There is no point in voicing the goal, it is clear and so.
